title: Place an Online Order
description: A customer browses a retail website and places an order for several items.

tasks.description: Add multiple items to the online shopping cart.
tasks.expected_outcome: All selected items are successfully added to the cart.

tasks.description: Proceed to checkout, enter shipping and billing information.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer accurately fills out their address and payment details.

tasks.description: Submit the order and receive an order confirmation number and email.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is successfully placed, and a confirmation is sent to the customer.
